original: 1.2 OWNERSHIP. As between PivX and Detto, PivX owns and retains all right, title, and interest in and to Qwik-Fix Pro and Documentation; all trademarks, service marks or trade names associated with Qwik-Fix Pro or Documentation (the "Trademarks"); all copyrights, patents, trade secret rights, and other intellectual property rights therein (collectively, together with Qwik-Fix Pro, Documentation, and Trademarks, the "Property"). Except as expressly granted herein, PivX does not grant to Detto any right or license, either express or implied, in Qwik-Fix Pro, Documentation or Property. Detto shall not reverse engineer, disassemble, decompile, or otherwise attempt to derive source code from Qwik-Fix Pro.

1.2 OWNERSHIP AND ACCESS. In the context of PivX and Detto, it is acknowledged that PivX holds exclusive ownership, title, and interest in Qwik-Fix Pro, Documentation, and all associated Trademarks (the "Property"). This includes any trademarks, service marks, or trade names related to Qwik-Fix Pro or Documentation, as well as copyrights, patents, trade secret rights, and other intellectual property rights (collectively referred to as the "Intellectual Property").

Detto is hereby granted a limited, non-exclusive, revocable, and non-transferable license to use Qwik-Fix Pro and Documentation solely for the purposes specified in this Agreement. This license does not grant Detto any right or privilege, either express or implied, regarding Qwik-Fix Pro, Documentation, or Property, except as explicitly stated herein.

Detto is strictly prohibited from reverse engineering, disassembling, decompiling, or otherwise attempting to derive source code from Qwik-Fix Pro for any purpose whatsoever without the express written consent of PivX. This clause shall survive any termination or expiration of this Agreement.

original: Detto represents and warrants to PivX that all Qwik-Fix Pro acquired hereunder is for redistribution in the ordinary course of Detto's business, and Detto agrees to provide PivX with appropriate resale certificate numbers and other documentation satisfactory to the applicable taxing authorities to substantiate any claim of exemption from any such taxes or fees.

original: 4.4 INDEMNIFICATION. Detto shall indemnify and hold PivX harmless from and against any and all damages, liabilities, costs and expenses (including reasonable attorney's fees) which PivX incurs as a result of any claim based on any breach of any representation or warranty, covenant or agreement by Detto under this Agreement or any breach of this Agreement by Detto; provided: (i) that PivX promptly gives written notice of any claim to Detto; (ii) at Detto's expense, PivX provides reasonable assistance which Detto may reasonably request for the defense of the claim; and (iii) Detto has the right to control the defense or settlement of the claim, provided, however, that PivX shall have the right to participate in, but not control, any litigation for which indemnification is sought with counsel of its own choosing, at its own expense.
ollama_generated:
4.4 LIABILITY SHIELDING. PivX shall be shielded and protected from, and Detto agrees to compensate PivX for, any and all damages, liabilities, costs, and expenses (including reasonable attorney's fees) that PivX may incur due to any claim arising from a violation of any representation, warranty, covenant, or agreement by Detto under this Agreement, or any breach of this Agreement by Detto. However, for this indemnification to apply:
   (i) PivX must promptly provide written notice to Detto about the claim;
   (ii) Detto shall be responsible for providing the necessary resources, at its own expense, for PivX to offer reasonable assistance in the defense of the claim as requested by Detto; and
   (iii) Detto retains the authority to control the defense or settlement of the claim. Nevertheless, PivX reserves the right to participate actively, albeit not controlling, in any litigation for which indemnification is sought, with counsel of its own choosing at its own expense.

original: (a) Detto shall, within thirty (30) days, pay to PivX all amounts due hereunder, return to PivX all products and demonstration copies received from PivX, erase any and all of the foregoing from all computer memories and storage devices within Detto's possession or control and, if requested, provide PivX with a signed written statement that Detto has complied with the foregoing obligations.

However, the full completion of these tasks may take longer than thirty (30) days due to technical constraints or other unforeseen circumstances, in which case Detto will continue to make reasonable efforts to fulfill these obligations promptly thereafter.

original: 6.2 THIS AGREEMENT CONTROLS; MERGER; AMENDMENT; WAIVER. This Agreement and Exhibit A to this Agreement shall control Detto's distribution of Qwik-Fix Pro and Documentation. All different or additional terms or conditions in any Detto purchase order or similar document shall be null and void. This Agreement, including Exhibit A, constitutes the final, complete, and exclusive agreement between the parties with respect to the subject matter hereof and supersedes all prior or contemporaneous agreements. No modification, amendment, or waiver of any provision of this Agreement shall be effective unless in writing signed by both parties. The failure or delay by either party in exercising any right, power or remedy under this Agreement shall not operate as a waiver of any such right, power or remedy.

original: for any disputes arising out of this Agreement. This Agreement may be executed simultaneously in two or more counterparts, each one of which shall be deemed an original, but all of which shall constitute one and the same instrument.

In the event of any disagreements pertaining to this Agreement, the parties involved shall first attempt resolution through good-faith negotiations. If a mutually satisfactory solution cannot be reached within a reasonable timeframe, then either party may initiate formal dispute resolution procedures, such as mediation or arbitration.

Regarding the execution of this Agreement, it can be signed separately by each party, with each counterpart considered valid and binding. However, all individual documents shall collectively represent a single agreement without any part having superiority over the other.
